flawed_nl_solution:
In 10 years, Kilee will be 20 years + 10 years = 30 years.
In ten years, Cornelia will be 3 * 30 years = <<3*30=90>>90 years old.
Cornelia is currently 90 years - 10 years = <<90-10=60>>60 years old
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
